bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition of brain heat affecting the nose and the eyes. Shi wu ben cao 食物本草 Substance Entry ran she dan 蚺蛇 膽：小兒腦熱，水漬注鼻中 , “For brain heat in children, soak it in water and pour it into the [child’s] nose”.

② Illness Sign identical with tou re 頭熱 , head heat. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry yang rou 羊肉:頭， 涼。治骨蒸，腦熱頭眩 , “Its head is of a cool nature and cures bone steaming and brain heat with a dizzy head”.
